attributes.action: Stop planning permission being granted by Sedgemoor council in regards to the White Hart,Cross, Nr Axbridge, Somerset
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The white hart @Cross is a grade two listed and fully commercially viable licensed Pub. The current absentee owners of the building wish to turn it into, two dwellings and to put a house in the car park. We say NO. We feel it is sad to see Historic buildings that proved both a service to the local community and employment for that community to be destroyed for a higher commercial gain.
The White Hart is a fully trading Pub and has always through history been as such. Infact the White Hart has always been a public House. 
We want to stop the unnecessary destruction of our heritage and save this valued community assit!
Join our group NOW!
